member.name: IPrintManagerInterop.GetForWindow
member.summary: Gets the PrintManager instance for the specified window.
member.param: The window to get the PrintManager instance for.
The reference ID of the specified window.
The PrintManager instance for the specified window.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPrintManagerInterop.ShowPrintUIForWindowAsync
member.summary: Displays the UI for printing content for the specified window.
member.param: The window to show the print UI for.
The reference ID of the specified window.
The asynchronous operation that reports completion.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPrintManagerInterop
member.summary: Enables access to PrintManager methods in a Windows Store app that manages multiple windows.
